swfscAirDAS 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Chop AirDAS effort segment length

Source: R/airdas_effort_chop.R
airdas_effort_chop.Rd

Determine lengths of segments into which to chop aerial DAS effort data

airdas_effort_chop(das.df, seg.km, randpicks = NULL)

Arguments

das.df

data frame; processed aerial DAS data output from airdas_process (or subsequent airdas function)
seg.km

numeric; length of effort segments
randpicks

numeric; if not NULL, segment positions that get leftover segment bits todo

Value

List of...

Details

Chop continuous effort section into effort segments (modeling segments)

Calculates dist_from_prev using swfscMisc::distance, if necessary

randpicks description

If segment length is 0, nothing..?

If segment length is less than target length, only make one segment

If segment length is greater than the target length and remainder is greater than or equal to half of the target length, the remainder is its own (randomly placed) segment

If segment length is greater than the target length and remainder is less than half of the target length, the remainder added to a random segment

Examples

y <- system.file("airdas_sample.das", package = "swfscAirDAS")
y.proc <- airdas_process(y)

airdas_effort_chop(y.proc[1:33, ], 1)
